visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: The chart should have a title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The x-axis should display months from January to December with labels styled in blue, 12px font size. The y-axis should not end on ticks and have a maximum padding of 0.25. The data series should include monthly rainfall data with the series name 'Rainfall'. The chart should have a light gray background and a black border. The legend should be positioned at the bottom of the chart.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The x-axis displays months from January to December with blue labels styled at 12px font size. The y-axis does not end on ticks and has a maximum padding of 0.25, with a title indicating the units as 'Rainfall (mm)'. The data series includes monthly rainfall data, named 'Rainfall'. The chart has a light gray background and a black border. The legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered horizontally.
